#summary This page describes how to install and configure iDocIt!.

= Installation =

*Prerequisites:*
 * Eclipse 3.6 (Helios) [http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/packages/eclipse-classic-362/heliossr2 Download]
 * WordNet Dictionary 3.0 for UNIX-like systems (also for Windows!)[http://wordnet.princeton.edu/wordnet/download/ Download]
 * Stanford PoS-Tagger-Models Basic Version 3.0.1 [http://nlp.stanford.edu/software/tagger.shtml Download]

*Installation:*
 # Download the Plugin-JARs from the Download-Section of this website. In any case you need de.akra.idocit.jar (iDocIt-Core) and de.akra.idocit.ui.jar (iDocIt-GUI). Depending on your requirements you may need also de.akra.idocit.wsdl (Plugin with WSDL Support) or de.akra.idocit.java (Plugin with Java Support).
 # Copy the downloaded JAR-files into the „plugins“-folder of your Eclipse installation folder.
 # Extract the Wordnet and PoS-Tagger into a special folder on your disk drive.
 # Start you Eclipse installation and open a workspace.
 # Enter the paths to Wordnet and the PoS-Tagger-model on the "iDocIt!"-Preference Page.
